choices: A Female Human who Meets A Male Dragon
A Male Human who Meets A Female Dragon
An evil sheep with with plans to create chaos with Body Swapping
A Dragon Company Testing a Body Swap Machine
Two dragon and Human Family's who hate eachother Getting Swapped with each other
1.content: Welcome To DragHuman earthverse,A Universe Were Humans And Dragons Coexist Together As Equals in a Modern Society(maybe with a evil race of sheep as well) before we discuss how 1 duo of these two species got swapped,what people are we following
1.title: Welcome To DragHuman earthverse

info.brief_description: Basically what the title says. One day, you wake up in a dragon's body.
info.description:
One day, you are walking around, when you see a dragon. Shortly after, you swap bodies. Did you cause this? The dragon? Someone else? An evil sheep with plans to create chaos? A crazy person banging on a keyboard? All good theories, but I'm going with the sheep one.
Just one rule about sex: no underage sex. That will be deleted.
Everything else...is allowed. Except bad grammar.
